execution_quality: Clean and focused execution with appropriate use of GitHub Actions path filtering. Agent read existing workflows, understood the requirements, and implemented the conditional logic correctly without unnecessary complexity.
work_category: CI/CD configuration enhancement to conditionally skip builds based on directory changes. Modified GitHub Actions workflows to add path-based build triggers for Flutter and Cloudflare Worker deployments.
summary: Agent successfully implemented conditional build skipping for Flutter and Cloudflare Worker pipelines by adding path filters to GitHub Actions workflows. The work was technically correct, appropriately scoped, and required no iteration before the user requested commit. Agent demonstrated good understanding of CI/CD patterns and avoided overengineering the solution.
follow_up_pattern: User requested commit of changes, indicating acceptance of the work and proceeding to source control management. No corrections or clarifications requested.
